attributes.action: Ensure Vote Leave's "£350 million for the NHS" pledge is kept.
attributes.additional_details:
Vote Leave's Iain Duncan Smith claims the clear and unambiguous pledge was never a commitment, despite the fact it may well have tipped the result in favour of Brexit:

http://www.huffingtonpost.co.uk/entry/iain-duncan-smith-350m-brexit-nhs-bus_uk_576f9f5ae4b0d2571149c4d1

UKIP's Nigel Farage claims the pledge was a "mistake":

http://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/politics/eu-referendum-result-nigel-farage-nhs-pledge-disowns-350-million-pounds-a7099906.html
attributes.background:
Vote Leave emblazoned this pledge on the side of its campaign bus: “Let’s give our NHS the £350 million the EU takes every week.”  Now they claim this was never a commitment.

In the interests of democracy the Government MUST ensure such a central campaign pledge is implemented.
